actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 407 of the Social Security Act to eliminate the present statutory requirement that aid to families with dependent children be denied when there is an unemployed father receiving compensation under a State or Federal unemployment compensation law.

summary.text: Eliminates the present prohibition against payment of aid to families with dependent children under the Social Security Act in cases where there is an unemployed father receiving unemployment compensation under State or Federal law.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 407 of the Social Security Act to eliminate the present statutory requirement that aid to families with dependent children be denied when there is an unemployed father receiving compensation under a State or Federal unemployment compensation law.
